en_text: For 1 turn, increase ATK by 50% for each Enhanced Dark Att. awakening skill on the team

jp_skill.name: 一瞬で終わらせてやる
jp_skill.raw_description: 1ターンの間、チーム内の闇属性強化の覚醒1個につき、 攻撃力が50％上昇。

kr_skill.name: 단숨에 끝내주마
kr_skill.raw_description: 1턴 동안 팀 내의 어둠속성 강화 각성 1개마다 공격력이 50% 상승

na_skill.name: I'll end this... in an instant.
na_skill.raw_description: ATK increases by 50% with number of [Enhanced Dark Att.] Awoken Skills in team for 1 turn
